column2: geom_map(data = ASPIRE_map, aes(map_id = iso3c, fill = ben_info), map = maps$countries) +
geom_polygon(data = maps$disputed, aes(long, lat, group = group, map_id = id), fill = "grey80") +
geom_polygon(data = maps$lakes, aes(long, lat, group = group), fill = "white")  +
title=str_wrap('Administrative Data Available on Beneficiary Counts or Expenditures in 2016 using ASPIRE',100),
